title: Pretzel AI Settings
description: Configure the settings for Pretzel: The AI extension for JupyterLab. Select the AI service you want to use (OpenAI API key, Use Pretzel AI Server or Use Azure API). Then, provide the necessary API keys and URLs based on the AI service you choose to use.

aiService.title: AI Service
aiService.description: Select the AI service to use for AI operations.

openAiBaseUrl.title: Base URL
openAiBaseUrl.description: (Optional) If your company uses OpenAI Enterprise, enter the URL for your company's OpenAI service (e.g., https://api.openai.com/v1/).

openAiModel.title: OpenAI Model
openAiModel.description: Select the OpenAI model to be used for AI completions. Only works with your OpenAI API key.

provider.title: Which AI model provider to use
provider.description: Recommended: Pretzel AI (no API key required) or Mistral (API key required)

mistralApiKey.title: Mistral API Key
mistralApiKey.description: Go to https://console.mistral.ai/api-keys/ to create an API Key

codeMatchThreshold.title: Code Match Threshold
codeMatchThreshold.description: The threshold for code similarity matching, between 0 and 100. High values result in only highly similar code being matched.
